mapper.select: select contract_number, payment_request_no, wholesaler_name, payment_amount, confirm, CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', confirm_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, confirm_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, confirm_time) as 'confirm_time', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', create_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, create_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, create_time) as 'create_time', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, last_modified_time) as 'last_modified_time' from DOLPHIN_CONTRACT_DISCOUNT where ( contract_number = #{contractNumber} or #{contractNumber} is null) and CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, last_modified_time) > #{startTime} and CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, last_modified_time) < #{endTime} order by contract_discount_id offset (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{pageSize} row fetch next ${pageSize} row only

select A.contract_id, A.contract_type, A.contract_number, A.outlet_no, A.outlet_name, A.outlet_type, A.prc_contract, CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', A.start_date)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, A.start_date) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, A.start_date) as 'start_date', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', A.end_date)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, A.end_date) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, A.end_date) as 'end_date', A.signer_id, A.signer_name, CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', A.sign_date)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, A.sign_date) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, A.sign_date) as 'sign_date', A.complete_discount, A.discount_target_rate, A.extra_discount, A.activity_session, A.contract_version, A.contract_state, A.po_no, A.target_base, CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', A.create_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, A.create_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, A.create_time) as 'create_time', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', A.last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, A.last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, A.last_modified_time) as 'last_modified_time', B.contract_detail_id, B.sub_brand_name, B.sub_brand_No, B.target_volume, B.target_value, B.key_subbrand, B.create_time, CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', B.create_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, B.create_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, B.create_time) as 'detail_create_time', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', B.last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, B.last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, B.last_modified_time) as 'detail_last_modified_time', D.contract_store_id, D.outlet_name as 'store_outlet_name', D.outlet_no as 'store_outlet_no', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', D.create_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, D.create_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, D.create_time) as 'store_create_time', CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', D.last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, D.last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, D.last_modified_time) as 'store_last_modified_time' from (select * from DOLPHIN_CONTRACT where (outlet_no = #{accountNo} or #{accountNo} is null ) and (po_no =#{poNo} or #{poNo} is null ) and CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, last_modified_time) > #{startTime} and CONVERT(BIGINT,DATEDIFF(MI,'1970-01-01 00:00:00.000', last_modified_time)) * 60000 + DATEPART(S, last_modified_time) * 1000 + DATEPART(MS, last_modified_time) < #{endTime} order by contract_id offset (#{pageNum} -1 ) * #{pageSize} row fetch next ${pageSize} row only ) A left outer JOIN DOLPHIN_CONTRACT_DETAIL B on B.contract_number = a.contract_number left outer join DOLPHIN_CONTRACT_OUTLET D on D.contract_number = a.contract_number
